concept.title: Sample theme file
concept.shortdesc: Theme files can be written in either or format. The docsrc/samples/themes/ folder in the DITA-OT installation directory provides several examples, including the theme used to produce the PDF output for the DITA-OT documentation.

conbody.note: The examples provided here are all in YAML format, which is generally more compact and readable than JSON.
